name: io.cordova.hellocordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.build: cd vue-app && npm install && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.browser: npm run build && cordova run browser
scripts.android: npm run build && cordova platform rm android && cordova platform add android && cordova build android
scripts.ios: npm run build && cordova platform rm ios && cordova platform add ios && cordova build ios
scripts.build-android: npm run build && cordova build android
scripts.release-android: npm run build && cordova build android --release
scripts.build-ios: npm run build && cordova build ios

author: Apache Cordova Team
